text: Moshi kare-ra 2-ri ga (gishō no) tsumi ni atai suru koto ga hanmei shitanaraba, kare-ra ni yotte furieki o kabutta-sha no naka kara (shisha ni) en no mottomo chikai tekisetsuna 2-ri no jinbutsu o arata ni shōgen ni tata se, arrā ni kakete chikawa se nasai. `Watashi-tachi no shōgen wa, hontōni 2-ri no shōgen yori mo shinjitsudearimasu. Watashi-tachi wa kesshite (tsumi o) okashita koto wa arimasen. Sōdeareba, watashi-tachi wa hontōni fugimonodearimasu
